Localization.Title: A Friend Returns
Localization.Text: As the beast slumps to the ground, a rustling from behind it draws your attention. Your last hero comes stagging out from the webs and trees badly wounded. They were able to escape on their own, but not without their own difficulties. Along with them is a small pathetic looking grey creature is sitting at the edge of the clearing staring at the giant spider's corpse. Nasty spider, she deserved it, she did. Yes, gollum. Took the hobbit away... why did she let them take the hobbit away!
